GSD.description:
ALSA: pcm: Test for "silence" field in struct "pcm_format_data"

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.19.239 by commit eb04e3112a3516e483d60a9af9762961702a6c1b. For more details please see the references link.
